name: todos
description: The list of todos in NextJS.

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-frontend && npm run install-codegen
scripts.build-all: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-codegen
scripts.lint-all: npm run lint-frontend && npm run lint-codegen
scripts.format-all: npm run format-frontend && npm run format-codegen
scripts.prep: npm run install-all && npm run build-all && npm run format-all

author: GabenGar
